channel.title: End the Spamming: Advertisement Section
channel.description:
So there is a section for classic advertisement but no rs2. You may say well there is a server status page. That is good except people still come on forums to advertise. I dont even like any of the servers on the status page except for like 3.
So to end the forum spamming of advertising in server download section, add a rs2 advertisement section. People actually have a spot to post their advertisements instead of spamming the download section. Discuss your opinion on this and Vote.
I know there is suggestions to improve the site but I wanted to do a poll and I think this should really be added.

item.title: End the Spamming: Advertisement Section
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

[quote=“marcbob, post:45, topic:341127”][quote author=LilXCj link=topic=437522.msg3216666#msg3216666 date=1274737328]
Get a team of people.

Get that team of people to looks to submission forms of advertised servers.

Servers that are sponsored are not accepted since they already earn a spot in another place.

By team of people. I mean a lot of people.

Oh wait… Not a lot of people are that responsible. Sorry.
[/quote]

Staff is lol[/quote]

But the current amount of staff wouldn’t be able to handle that many submissions since they have other things to handle as well.

Read full topic

item.title: End the Spamming: Advertisement Section
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:42, topic:341127”][quote author=marcbob link=topic=437522.msg3215957#msg3215957 date=1274663405]
The forum would get way more use than server status page within days. I still think it would be alot different than when it was tried in past. My main point is just give it another try because more people would use that than server status page
[/quote]

Why would it be any different than it was in the past exactly? I see no reason to believe that would be the case. Also what advantages would creating a topic have over entering a server on the serverstatus page? Since I can list many advantages of the status page over a topic.[/quote]

Alot better staff then there was in the past id say. Also more people use the forums, servers would get more views and it would give servers a chance without 24/7 to get seen. Server status is good but in my opinion it just shows which servers are online the most and doesnt get your server much publicity.

Read full topic

item.description:

You do realize this would bring the level of incompetency of MoparScape members up even higher than it is now, right?

Any other community would actually respect this privilege. I don’t why its so hard to make change in this community, people just need to respect these rules, and if they don’t they should be infracted/banned. Rules are meant to be kept.

The server status section was my best friend back then.

Now I rarely touch the server status page itself.

item.title: End the Spamming: Advertisement Section
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

One problem with rep is that it means nothing, I would like it to mean something.

Also yes there is flame, spam, trolls, gayness in the forms already. It would just be more of that, we don’t need more we need to fix what we have now, not add more on top of what we need to fix.

Read full topic

item.title: End the Spamming: Advertisement Section
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob

item.title: End the Spamming: Advertisement Section
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

They tried to fix the rep abuse many times, is it fixed yet? No, I doubt that they will add rs2 advertising since it is so big compared to RSC. There would be massive flame, trolling, spam, failing, gayness, etc. There is no point in trying it again since it failed so hard last time. I doubt the community is even ready for something like this when we can’t even control are rep.

Read full topic

item.title: End the Spamming: Advertisement Section
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

[quote=“jmood128, post:22, topic:341127”]You need to fix your quote, I never said that. Also Ive seen many topics get locked due to excessive spam and flame.

proof: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,437334.40.html[/quote]

Ya but it would be the same. Moparisthebest already said no so i doubt this will happen anymore. Some people bring up how servers with more likes on the server status page wont get noticed on this. This isnt the server status page so people will show how much they like a server by how many views and comments it has. I still dont see the reason for it not happening but I think there would be no problem and they should give it a try because it has been years.

Read full topic

item.title: End the Spamming: Advertisement Section
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:19, topic:341127”][quote author=krackkid link=topic=437522.msg3215485#msg3215485 date=1274641360]

You should also add in the fact it will be a nesting ground for massive spam, trolling, failing, etc.

AKA KrackkidTown, problems I mite see…

  1. People would be like “Omfg that server sucks only fucking queers would play it, how about you guys join myserver!”
  2. People bump them for no reason with replys like “I JUST GOT 126!”
  3. People spamming “OMFG delta fail”
  4. People posting delta servers-.-…
  5. Troll fest
    [/quote]

Who cares, people will need to learn to have criticism. If people don’t like delta, and the person who posts it know it, they deserve flame.[/quote]
Well I guess that about sums up this thread?, most-all topic will be locked do to spam/flame.

Read full topic
